goal1: Develop a comprehensive understanding of typical software development tasks by analyzing existing project data, industry benchmarks, and user feedback. Use this knowledge base to categorize tasks into distinct capability areas.
goal2: Implement an initial set of performance metrics such as task completion time, accuracy rate, and user satisfaction scores. Continuously monitor these KPIs to identify areas for improvement and track progress towards predefined targets.
goal3: Integrate a basic version of long-term memory functionality that records outcomes of previously attempted tasks. Use this data to inform future decision-making by leveraging insights from past experiences.
